references.reason: This is the first paper to formally introduce and study the Bahncard problem, which this paper builds upon.

references.paper_title: Competitive caching with machine learned advice
references.reason: This seminal work introduced the framework of online algorithms with predictions, which this paper extends to the Bahncard problem.

references.paper_title: The primal-dual method for learning-augmented algorithms
references.reason: This paper is the only previous work that explicitly designs a learning-augmented algorithm for the Bahncard problem, which this paper improves upon.

references.paper_title: Improving online algorithms via ml predictions
references.reason: This paper provides a general framework for improving online algorithms using machine-learned predictions, which is relevant to this paper's approach.

references.paper_title: Optimal robustness-consistency trade-offs for learning-augmented online algorithms
references.reason: This paper studies the theoretical properties of learning-augmented algorithms, including consistency and robustness, which are also analyzed in this paper for the proposed algorithm.
